channel.title: MCX:BANE on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in MCX:BANE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Russia Says Drone Attack Hasn’t Affected Bashneft Refinery Work
item.description: Russian authorities say a fire at the Bashneft PJSC complex, caused by a Ukrainian drone attack on Saturday, is extinguished and the plant will continue to operate as usual.

item.title: Russia Says Drone Attack Hasn’t Affected Bashneft Refinery Work
item.description: Russian authorities say a fire at the Bashneft PJSC complex, caused by a Ukrainian drone attack on Saturday, is extinguished and the plant will continue to operate as usual.

item.title: Ukraine Says Its Drone Struck Bashneft’s Novoil Refinery in Ufa
item.description: Ukraine’s military intelligence unit struck the Bashneft PJSC Novoil oil refinery in Ufa, Bashkortostan, on Saturday, according to a person familiar with the operation.

item.title: Ukraine Says Its Drone Struck Bashneft’s Novoil Refinery in Ufa
